mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.kit_no AS "kitNo", a.sub_line_no AS "subLineNo", a.parent_line_no AS "parentLineNo", a.status AS "status", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.sub_sku_code AS "subSkuCode", a.sub_sku_type AS "subSkuType", a.qty_bom_ea AS "qtyBomEa", a.pack_code AS "packCode", a.uom AS "uom", a.qty_plan_ea AS "qtyPlanEa", a.qty_alloc_ea AS "qtyAllocEa", a.qty_pk_ea AS "qtyPkEa", a.qty_kit_ea AS "qtyKitEa", a.rotation_rule AS "rotationRule", a.alloc_rule AS "allocRule", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.zone_code AS "zoneCode", a.loc_code AS "locCode", a.trace_id AS "traceId", a.lot_att01 AS "lotAtt01", a.lot_att02 AS "lotAtt02", a.lot_att03 AS "lotAtt03", a.lot_att04 AS "lotAtt04", a.lot_att05 AS "lotAtt05", a.lot_att06 AS "lotAtt06", a.lot_att07 AS "lotAtt07", a.lot_att08 AS "lotAtt08", a.lot_att09 AS "lotAtt09", a.lot_att10 AS "lotAtt10", a.lot_att11 AS "lotAtt11", a.lot_att12 AS "lotAtt12", a.def1 AS "def1", a.def2 AS "def2", a.def3 AS "def3", a.def4 AS "def4", a.def5 AS "def5", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.header_id AS "headerId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_kit_sub_detail( id, kit_no, sub_line_no, parent_line_no, status, owner_code, sub_sku_code, sub_sku_type, qty_bom_ea, pack_code, uom, qty_plan_ea, qty_alloc_ea, qty_pk_ea, qty_kit_ea, rotation_rule, alloc_rule, area_code, zone_code, loc_code, trace_id, lot_att01, lot_att02, lot_att03, lot_att04, lot_att05, lot_att06, lot_att07, lot_att08, lot_att09, lot_att10, lot_att11, lot_att12, def1, def2, def3, def4, def5, remarks, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id, header_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{kitNo}, #{subLineNo}, #{parentLineNo}, #{status}, #{ownerCode}, #{subSkuCode}, #{subSkuType}, #{qtyBomEa}, #{packCode}, #{uom}, #{qtyPlanEa}, #{qtyAllocEa}, #{qtyPkEa}, #{qtyKitEa}, #{rotationRule}, #{allocRule}, #{areaCode}, #{zoneCode}, #{locCode}, #{traceId}, #{lotAtt01}, #{lotAtt02}, #{lotAtt03}, #{lotAtt04}, #{lotAtt05}, #{lotAtt06}, #{lotAtt07}, #{lotAtt08}, #{lotAtt09}, #{lotAtt10}, #{lotAtt11}, #{lotAtt12}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def4}, #{def5}, #{remarks}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId}, #{headerId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_kit_sub_detail SET kit_no = #{kitNo}, sub_line_no = #{subLineNo}, parent_line_no = #{parentLineNo}, status = #{status}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, sub_sku_code = #{subSkuCode}, sub_sku_type = #{subSkuType}, qty_bom_ea = #{qtyBomEa}, pack_code = #{packCode}, uom = #{uom}, qty_plan_ea = #{qtyPlanEa}, qty_alloc_ea = #{qtyAllocEa}, qty_pk_ea = #{qtyPkEa}, qty_kit_ea = #{qtyKitEa}, rotation_rule = #{rotationRule}, alloc_rule = #{allocRule}, area_code = #{areaCode}, zone_code = #{zoneCode}, loc_code = #{locCode}, trace_id = #{traceId}, lot_att01 = #{lotAtt01}, lot_att02 = #{lotAtt02}, lot_att03 = #{lotAtt03}, lot_att04 = #{lotAtt04}, lot_att05 = #{lotAtt05}, lot_att06 = #{lotAtt06}, lot_att07 = #{lotAtt07}, lot_att08 = #{lotAtt08}, lot_att09 = #{lotAtt09}, lot_att10 = #{lotAtt10}, lot_att11 = #{lotAtt11}, lot_att12 = #{lotAtt12}, def1 = #{def1}, def2 = #{def2}, def3 = #{def3}, def4 = #{def4}, def5 = #{def5}, remarks = #{remarks}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, org_id = #{orgId}, header_id = #{headerId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.select:
SELECT cws.sku_name AS "subSkuName", cwp.cdpa_format AS "packDesc", cwpr.cdpr_desc AS "uomDesc", cwpr.cdpr_quantity AS "uomQty", crah.rule_name AS "allocRuleName", crrh.rule_name AS "rotationRuleName", cwa.area_name AS "areaName", cwz.zone_name AS "zoneName", (CASE WHEN IFNULL(cwpr.cdpr_quantity,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE a.qty_plan_ea/cwpr.cdpr_quantity END) AS "qtyPlanUom", (CASE WHEN IFNULL(cwpr.cdpr_quantity,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE a.qty_alloc_ea/cwpr.cdpr_quantity END) AS "qtyAllocUom", (CASE WHEN IFNULL(cwpr.cdpr_quantity,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE a.qty_pk_ea/cwpr.cdpr_quantity END) AS "qtyPkUom", (CASE WHEN IFNULL(cwpr.cdpr_quantity,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE a.qty_kit_ea/cwpr.cdpr_quantity END) AS "qtyKitUom", wkpd.plan_kit_loc AS "planKitLoc",
FROM wm_kit_sub_detail a LEFT JOIN cd_wh_sku cws ON a.sub_sku_code = cws.sku_code AND a.owner_code = cws.owner_code AND a.org_id = cws.org_id LEFT JOIN wm_kit_header wkh ON a.kit_no = wkh.kit_no AND a.org_id = wkh.org_id LEFT JOIN wm_kit_parent_detail wkpd ON a.kit_no = wkpd.kit_no AND a.parent_line_no = wkpd.parent_line_no AND a.org_id = wkpd.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package cwp ON a.pack_code = cwp.cdpa_code AND a.org_id = cwp.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package_relation cwpr ON a.uom = cwpr.cdpr_unit_level AND a.org_id = cwpr.org_id AND cwpr.cdpr_cdpa_pm_code = cwp.pm_code LEFT JOIN cd_rule_alloc_header crah ON crah.rule_code = a.alloc_rule AND crah.org_id = a.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_rule_rotation_header crrh ON crrh.rule_code = a.rotation_rule AND crrh.org_id = a.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_area cwa ON a.area_code = cwa.area_code AND a.org_id = cwa.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_zone cwz ON a.zone_code = cwz.zone_code AND a.org_id = cwz.org_id WHERE a.kit_no = #{kitNo} AND a.org_id = #{orgId}

SELECT cws.sku_name AS "subSkuName", cwp.cdpa_format AS "packDesc", cwpr.cdpr_desc AS "uomDesc", cwpr.cdpr_quantity AS "uomQty", crah.rule_name AS "allocRuleName", crrh.rule_name AS "rotationRuleName", cwa.area_name AS "areaName", cwz.zone_name AS "zoneName", (CASE WHEN IFNULL(cwpr.cdpr_quantity,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE a.qty_plan_ea/cwpr.cdpr_quantity end) AS "qtyPlanUom", (CASE WHEN IFNULL(cwpr.cdpr_quantity,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE a.qty_alloc_ea/cwpr.cdpr_quantity end) AS "qtyAllocUom", (CASE WHEN IFNULL(cwpr.cdpr_quantity,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE a.qty_pk_ea/cwpr.cdpr_quantity end) AS "qtyPkUom", (CASE WHEN IFNULL(cwpr.cdpr_quantity,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE a.qty_kit_ea/cwpr.cdpr_quantity end) AS "qtyKitUom", wkpd.plan_kit_loc AS "planKitLoc",
FROM wm_kit_sub_detail a LEFT JOIN cd_wh_sku cws ON a.sub_sku_code = cws.sku_code AND a.owner_code = cws.owner_code AND a.org_id = cws.org_id LEFT JOIN wm_kit_header wkh ON a.kit_no = wkh.kit_no AND a.org_id = wkh.org_id LEFT JOIN wm_kit_parent_detail wkpd ON a.kit_no = wkpd.kit_no AND a.parent_line_no = wkpd.parent_line_no AND a.org_id = wkpd.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package cwp ON a.pack_code = cwp.cdpa_code AND a.org_id = cwp.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package_relation cwpr ON a.uom = cwpr.cdpr_unit_level AND a.org_id = cwpr.org_id AND cwpr.cdpr_cdpa_pm_code = cwp.pm_code LEFT JOIN cd_rule_alloc_header crah ON crah.rule_code = a.alloc_rule AND crah.org_id = a.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_rule_rotation_header crrh ON crrh.rule_code = a.rotation_rule AND crrh.org_id = a.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_area cwa ON a.area_code = cwa.area_code AND a.org_id = cwa.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_zone cwz ON a.zone_code = cwz.zone_code AND a.org_id = cwz.org_id WHERE a.kit_no = #{kitNo} AND a.sub_line_no = #{subLineNo} AND a.org_id = #{orgId}
SELECT MAX(CONVERT(a.sub_line_no, SIGNED )) FROM wm_kit_sub_detail a WHERE a.kit_no = #{kitNo} AND a.org_id = #{orgId}
